document_data.mainbody:
'''''Frozen Whispers''''', designed by [[Greg Marks]] and [[Shawn Banerjee]], is an adventure in the [[Adventurers League/Dreams of the Red Wizards|Dreams of the Red Wizards]] storyline published for the [[Adventurers League]]. It is the second part of The Cold Dark series.

{{Quote|''Something in Xorvintroth is harming your allies at the Harper safe house. If you can't find and stop it, your mission will be over before you ever take the fight to the Red Wizards.''{{Cite adventurers league/Frozen Whispers|1}}|}}
